description: {8The Path here winds between large mausoleums which have large cracks in
the walls and are in obvious disrepair.  Stone crumbling from the walls
litter the path and the smell of death and decay permeates the air.  here
and there bones litter the ground from the discarded corpses of the dead.
New and old blood stains the mausoleums surrounding the area with clumps
of gore clinging to pieces of the stone.{x

40747.name: {8A Path Between the {rM{8a{wu{8s{ro{Wl{we{8ums{x

description: {8This path follows the roofs of several of the large mausoleums that are very
close together.  To the north can be seen the entrance to a large skull shaped
structure.  All around, you can see bodies laying on the ground in various
states of decay.  The smell is almost unbearable and continues to get worse
the further north you travel along the roofs of the buildings.{x

40732.name: {8A Path Between the {rM{8a{wu{8s{ro{Wl{we{8ums{x

description: {8Here the path crosses a stream that winds its way between the mausoleums.
The closeby source of water being the reason for the above ground burrial
chambers scattered all over this graveyard.  The water is a dirty brown
in color and is impossible to tell how deep it runs.  The smells of death
decay waft through the slight breezes between the giant structures surrounding
you.{x

40715.name: {8A Path Between the {rM{8a{wu{8s{ro{Wl{we{8ums{x

description: {8This is the inside of an ancient broken mausoleum.  bones are scattered along
the walls along with more fresher body parts.  The smell of rotting things
confined within a small room is almost unbearable.  Blood stains cross the
walls from hands whos owners thrashed about in their death throws after having
been thrown here to die.{x

40734.name: {8A Path Between the {rM{8a{wu{8s{ro{Wl{we{8ums{x

description: {8The Path here winds between large mausoleums which have large cracks in
the walls and are in obvious disrepair.  Stone crumbling from the walls
litter the path and the smell of death and decay permeates the air.  here
and there bones litter the ground from the discarded corpses of the dead.
New and old blood stains the mausoleums surrounding the area with clumps
of gore clinging to pieces of the stone.{x
